doc.field: Subseries B: The Interior and the Collection
5 Historic Albums mostly of the interior and works of art at present in the Collection or probably formerly once belonging to it.
Subseries B: The Interior and the Collection
5 Historic Albums mostly of the interior and works of art at present in the Collection or probably formerly once belonging to it.
5a. Album of Color prints of Villa la Pietra
5a. Album of Color prints of Villa la Pietra

An album of 27 large Color prints of the interior of Villa La Pietra in Carbochrome. On the title page "La Pietra, tome II La Maison 1973". Two pages of introduction in French, mentioning "le très docte et très raffiné Harold Acton".
Subseries B: The Interior and the Collection
5 Historic Albums mostly of the interior and works of art at present in the Collection or probably formerly once belonging to it.
